channel.title: [Help] Changing the Color of the Red X on Click
channel.description: [shadow=Grey,left][size=18pt]How do I change the X 'Client sided' when the player clickes like on Overloadx Its Green I and to make it so its Orange. Im not using Overload Client BTW.[/size]
